body:
Comment 6 by **czarek.tomczak**: 
#5 dvyu...@google.com

I can't include neither <windows.h> (GetLastError) nor "stdio.h" (printf). Getting
errors:

    src\pkg\runtime\mem_windows.c:7 8c: No such file or directory: windows.h

    src\pkg\runtime\mem_windows.c:6 8c: No such file or directory: stdio.h

Added:

    #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
    #include <windows.h>
    #include "stdio.h"
